mapper.select: select * from city where city_id = (select city_id from location where location_id = #{location_id})
select * from area where area_id = (select area_id from location where location_id = #{location_id})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_corr_add ( id, customer_id, flat_no, building, area_id, city_id, pin ) VALUES ( #{address.addressId}, #{customerId}, #{address.flatNo}, #{address.building}, #{address.area.areaId}, #{address.city.cityId}, #{address.pin} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE flat_no = IF(#{address.flatNo} IS NOT NULL, #{address.flatNo}, flat_no), building = IF(#{address.building} IS NOT NULL, #{address.building}, building), area_id = IF(#{address.area} IS NOT NULL, #{address.area.areaId}, area_id), city_id = IF(#{address.city} IS NOT NULL, #{address.city.cityId}, city_id), pin = IF(#{address.pin} IS NOT NULL, #{address.pin}, pin);

INSERT INTO wiper.emp_corr_add ( id, emp_id, flat_no, building, area_id, city_id, pin ) VALUES ( #{address.addressId}, #{employeeId}, #{address.flatNo}, #{address.building}, #{address.area.areaId}, #{address.city.cityId}, #{address.pin} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE flat_no = IF(#{address.flatNo} IS NOT NULL, #{address.flatNo}, flat_no), building = IF(#{address.building} IS NOT NULL, #{address.building}, building), area_id = IF(#{address.area} IS NOT NULL, #{address.area.areaId}, area_id), city_id = IF(#{address.city} IS NOT NULL, #{address.city.cityId}, city_id), pin = IF(#{address.pin} IS NOT NULL, #{address.pin}, pin);

INSERT INTO wiper.vehicle_add( id, vehicle_id , lot_num, floor , building, pin , area_id , city_id ) VALUES ( #{address.addressId}, #{vehicleId}, #{address.parkingLotNo}, #{address.floor}, #{address.building}, #{address.pin}, #{address.area.areaId}, #{address.city.cityId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE lot_num = IF(#{address.parkingLotNo} IS NOT NULL, #{address.parkingLotNo}, lot_num), floor = IF(#{address.floor} IS NOT NULL, #{address.floor}, floor), building = IF(#{address.building} IS NOT NULL, #{address.building}, building), pin = IF(#{address.pin} IS NOT NULL, #{address.pin}, pin), area_id = IF(#{address.area.areaId} IS NOT NULL, #{address.area.areaId}, area_id), city_id = IF(#{address.city.cityId} IS NOT NULL, #{address.city.cityId}, city_id);
